Aluno- Arthur Martinho Medeiros Oliveira	
Matricula- 813168

1_
a) C1,6 (1001(2)) = X(2)
1001(2) = 0 1001 = 1 0110(2)

b) C1,8 (1100(2)) = X(2)
1100(2) = 0 1100 = 1 0011 00(2)

c) C2,6 (101101(2)) = X(2)
101101(2) = 0 101101 = 1 010010(2)

d) C2,7 (100111(2)) = X(2)
100111(2) = 0 100111 = 1 0110000 + 1 = 1 0110001(2)

e) C2,8 (110001(2)) = X(2)
110001(2) = 0 110001 = 1 00111000 + 1 = 1 00111001(2)

2_
a) C1,6 (312(4)) = 0303(4) = 0110 0011(2) 
= 1001 1100(2) = 9C(16)

b) C1,8 (5F(16)) = 0101 1111(2) =
 1010 0001(2) = A1(16)

c) C2,6 (123(4)) = 0124(4) = 0010 0100(2) =
 1101 1011(2) = DB(16)

d) C2,10 (147(8)) = 001 100 111(2) =
 110 011 001(2) = 663(8)

e) C2,8 (D5(16)) = 1101 0101(2) =
 0010 1011(2) = 2B(16)

3_
a)
10101(2) = 01010(2) = +10(10)

b) 
110011(2) = 001100(2) = +12(10)

c) 
100111(2) = 011000(2) = +24(10)

d) 
1011011(2) = 0100101(2) = +37(10)

e) 
1010001(2) = 0101111(2) = +47(10)

4_
a) 
11100(2) - 1101(2) = 11100 - 01101 = 01111(2)


b) 
101,0111(2) - 10,11(2) = 101,0111 - 10,11 = 010,1010(2)

c) 
231(4) - 132(4) = 231 - 132 = 99(10) = 213(4)

d) 
513(8) - 173(8) = 513 - 173 = 340(10) = 524(8)

e) 
8B3(16) - C4F(16) = 8B3 - C4F = 1D4(16) = 468(10) = 1D4(16)

5_
a) 101011(2) - 1110(2) = 00101011 - 00001110 =
 00111101 + C2,8(00001110) = 00111101 + 11110010 =
 00111011(2)

b) 101,1011(2) - 2,4(8) = 101,1011 - 0000,0010 =
 001,1001 + C2,8(0000,0010) = 001,1001 + 1111,1101 =
 001,0100(2)

c) 312(4) - D(16) = 00110010 - 1101 = 00110010 - 00001101 =
 00110010 + C2,8(00001101) = 00110010 + 11110011 =
 00100001(2)

d) C3(16) - 1011001(2) = 11000011 - 1011001 = 11000011 - 01011001 =
 11000011 + C2,8(01011001) = 11000011 + 10100111 =
 01101010(2)

e) 51(10) - 2D(16) = 00110011 - 00101101 = 00110011 - 00101101 =
 00110011 + C2,8(00101101) = 00110011 + 11010011 =
 00001010(2)
